Title: Aliens vs. Predator: Requiem
Genre: Action, Adventure, Fantasy, Horror, Sci-Fi, Thriller
Writer: Shane Salerno, Dan O'Bannon ("Alien" characters), Ronald Shusett ("Alien" characters), Jim Thomas ("Predator" characters), John Thomas ("Predator" characters)
Actors: Steven Pasquale, Reiko Aylesworth, John Ortiz, Johnny Lewis
Plot: Warring Alien and Predator races descend on a rural Colorado town, where unsuspecting residents must band together for any chance of survival.
